fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Launch KS Nook on the Kindle Fire
2. Navigate to Miscellaneous > Photo Gallery
3. Choose a photo

Actual result:
A gray image view is displayed

Expected result:
The image is displayed in the image view
*Note* works in 1.8.2
Log is attached
fields.summary: Android: KitchenSinkNook - Photo Gallery - After selecting an image from the photo gallery, it is not displayed
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 2.0.0.201203291340
Ti Mobile SDK 2.0.0.v20120329191102 hash r1fbf18c4
OSX Lion 10.7.3
Kindle Fire

comments.body: This looks to be a bug on Kindle Fire 6.3, not much we can do about it
Closing ticket as the issue will not fix.
